product_name: No7Protect & Perfect Intense Advanced Dual Action Cleansing Water
summary: SummaryEffectively and thoroughly wash away all makeup, oil, and pollutants with the No7 Protect & Perfect Intense Advanced Dual Action Cleansing Water. An ideal first step for your morning and evening skincare routine, it provides a receptive base for serums and moisturizers to work for your skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently cleanses the skin without dryingLightweight yet hydratingFor a softer, brighter-looking complexionLeaves skin looking luminous and feeling nourishedMinimizes the appearance of poresReveals refreshingly clean skinDermatologically testedKey IngredientsUses a blend of fruit extracts supercharged with antioxidants and natural AHAs, it nourishes and exfoliates skin, leaving it feeling softer, smoother and more suppleItem 2584194How To UseUse as the first step of your morning and evening anti-aging routine.Soak a cotton pad with the Cleansing WaterGently swipe over your skin in circular motions, avoiding the delicate eye areaFollow with No7 Protect & Perfect serum & moisturizerSunburn Alert: This product contains alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure during usage of this product and for a week after use of the product has stopped. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Do not apply to irritated or broken skin. If this becomes uncomfortable, remove and rinse your face thoroughly. Use only as directed. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Polysorbate 20, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit/Leaf Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Dipropylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Potassium Hydroxide, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Morus Alba Leaf Extract.
how_to_use: Use as the first step of your morning and evening anti-aging routine.Soak a cotton pad with the Cleansing WaterGently swipe over your skin in circular motions, avoiding the delicate eye areaFollow with No7 Protect & Perfect serum & moisturizerSunburn Alert: This product contains alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure during usage of this product and for a week after use of the product has stopped. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Do not apply to irritated or broken skin. If this becomes uncomfortable, remove and rinse your face thoroughly. Use only as directed. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration.

reviews.headline: Will never use again!
reviews.comments: I use No7 products. I have sensitive skin. This one wrecked havoc with my skin! I had to go to a social event with hives on my face.  Way too harsh! Took days my skin to recover.  I use to use the misecullar water all the time.  They stopped making it.  If it ain't broke don't fix it. Disgusted!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I got sample of the No7 Protect and Perfect Intense Advanced Cleansing Water from BzzAgent, to try out for a few weeks. I had heard of this brand and its overall good reviews, but had never actually tried any of their products, so I was looking forward to doing so. 
I was slightly confused as to what a cleansing water was. Was it a simple micellar water, was it more like a face wash, should I rinse it off...? The product just recommended to use it as the first part of your anti aging skincare routine and what I looked up seems to say it was closer to a micellar water, and said nothing about rising off, so I just put some on a cotton pad and wiped my face off, no makeup remover used, no micellar water, no face wash, no other cleanser. 
The first night I just used the product by itself, no moisturizer or toner or anything else, just to see how my skin reacted. The product does have a slight perfume-y smell, a little strong but didn't bother me, but might bother those sensitive to scented products, and it did make my face feel a little tingly which worried me at first but ended up being fine.
 It did seem to take a good bit of makeup off, but I had to use something else for my eye area, because it said to not use there because of the AHAs and such. It made my skin feel clean, and the next day, I woke up with a soft, clean, not tight feeling face, and I really liked it and little by little started to add my regular skin products to this. 
Overall, I feel like it really helped to even my skin tone, most likely because of the exfoliant factor, but because of the same, after daily use it did start to dry my skin out, even with my moisturizer and sunscreen (especially important with use of AHA products), plus it also seems like my skin just went into purging mode big time, I'm usually not one for much acne, but since starting the product, I've had to buy a few sheets of pimple patches and my skin feels a little...rougher?
I'd definitely recommend it for evening skin tone, but maybe not every day, and maybe taking a definitely in conjunction with other cleansing products, not just by itself. I think I'll continue to use it, just a little more sparingly, on and off.
faceoff_positive.headline: Even Skin, But Watch Out

faceoff_negative.comments: I truly wanted to love this product. And I will start with the positive la which lead to my 3 star review. The smell is amazing. It's faint, not over the top, but very clean and relaxing. The product felt amazing going on, no burning, no stinging, just clean! I used this after my face wash at night and was amazed at how much yuck was left behind. My skin glowed! It looked amazing! I don't wear much makeup, if any at all, so the look this gave my skin was very much welcomed. So all the checks are in place the first few days, and I thought I had found a product that I could t live without. Alas, 3-4 days after starting this product the unimaginable….. a massive blackhead breakout. I've never had an issue with breakouts. And at 40, I don't see them at all anymore. So this was an absolute shocker to me. I looked back and tried to think of anything else that may have changed…. And nothing. Even the weather has remained the same. I honestly believe this product may work beautifully for some, sadly it didn't for me. I imagine I will still use it before work ( I work 3 12s). But otherwise, I'll be sticking to my old regimen.
faceoff_negative.headline: Really wanted to love this
